DOC.brief_title: PF-3512676 ( CPG 7909 ) Injection For Patients Who Completed An Oncology Study Using PF-3512676 ( CPG 7909 )
DOC.criteria: Immediate ( within 4 week ) prior completion clinical trial PF3512676 Injection alone combination antineoplastic treatment malignancy . The patient receive antineoplastic therapy since complete prior trial PF3512676 Injection , participate another clinical trial follow participation trial PF3512676 Injection .
